Applications and IoT

Genesys Impact provides all the phases of the software development lifecycle that will allow their clients to meet their mission goals and objectives.

Software Development

Our skilled and knowledgeable software engineers have extensive experience implementing custom software solutions in diverse vertical industries.

Our developers analyze thoroughly all-functional, technical, operational, and financial requirements in order to accurately define and understand your business needs and challenges. We conduct a detailed, in-depth analysis and assess your needs, in order to come up with a strategic plan and Statement of Work. Our aim is to create a custom software solution for your business that reflects current and future IT needs.

Also, in the wide scope of our numerous services, our consultants have extensive cross-industry experience allowing us to provide highly sophisticated database solutions that are fast, reliable and efficient.

Technologies

  • .NET
  • Ruby
  • Javascript
  • Python
  • Django
  • React
